# Luthor LLM Index

This file helps AI agents discover Luthor docs quickly.

- Site: https://luthor.lyfie.app
- Demo: https://luthor.lyfie.app/demo/
- Docs home: https://luthor.lyfie.app/docs/
- Full corpus: https://luthor.lyfie.app/llms-full.txt
- Sitemap: https://luthor.lyfie.app/sitemap-index.xml
